alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:29PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorm west of the Portneuf Gap tracking west toward Michaud Flats and the American Falls Reservoir through 545 PM MDT... At 425 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm east of the Portneuf Gap, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Brief moderate to heavy rain, wind gusts to 35 mph, small hail, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects as well as create hazardous boating conditions on American Falls Reservoir. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, American Falls Reservoir, Fort Hall Bannock Creek Lodge and Mink Creek Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building and if on American Falls Reservoir, now might be a good time to move ashore.

area.areaDesc: Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
